Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Kodi anthu awiriwa ndi ofanana? Iye amene tamulonjeza lonjezo labwino ndipo adzalikwaniritsa ndi iye amene tamupatsa zokoma zambiri za m’moyo uno koma pa tsiku lachiweruzo adzakhala m’gulu la iwo olangidwa
Pa tsiku limeneli Mulungu adzawaitana ndipo adzati, “Kodi aja munkati ndi anzanga ali kuti?”

Iwo amene adzapezeka ndi mlandu wotere adzati, “Awa ndiwo anthu amene ife tidawasocheretsa. Ife tidawasocheretsa chifukwa nafenso tidali osochera. Ife tsopano tadzipatula (kuchoka mwa iwo) ndi kudza kwa inu. Si ndife amene iwo anali kupembedza.”
Ndipo kudzanenedwa kwa iwo kuti, “Itanani anzanu kuti akuthandizeni.” Iwo adzawaitana koma iwo sadzawamva ayi. Ndipo iwo adzalawa chilango chowawa. Iwo adzafunitsitsa akadatsogozedwa bwino
Tsiku limene Mulungu adzawaitana nati, “Kodi inu mudanena zotani kwa Mtumwi?”
Zodandaula zawo sizidzamveka ayi, kotero sadzatha kufunsana wina ndi mnzake
Akakhala iye amene alapa zoipa zake nakhulupirira ndipo achita ntchito zabwino, mwina akhoza kudzakhala pakati pa anthu opambana
Ndipo Ambuye wako amalenga ndi kusankha aliyense amene Iye wamufuna. Kusankha si kwawo ayi. Ulemerero ukhale kwa Mulungu ndipo Iye atalikirane ndi zimene amamufanizira nazo
Ambuye wako amadziwa zonse zimene amazibisa m’mitima mwawo ndiponso zimene amaziulula
Iye ndi Mulungu ndipo palibenso mulungu wina koma Iye yekha. Kuyamikidwa konse ndi kwake m’moyo uno ndiponso m’moyo umene uli nkudza. Ndipo chake ndi chiweruzo ndipo kwa Iye mudzabwerera
Nena, “Ndiuzeni! Ngati Mulungu atapanga usiku kuti usache mpaka pa tsiku louka kwa akufa, kodi ndi mulungu uti kupatula Mulungu weniweni amene akhoza kukupatsani usana? Kodi simukumva?”

Nena, “Ndiuzeni! Ngati Mulungu atapanga usana kuti kusade mpaka pa tsiku louka kwa akufa, kodi ndi mulungu uti kupatula Mulungu weniweni amene akhoza kukupatsani usiku umene inu mumapumulamo? Kodi inu simukuona?”
Mwachifundo chake wakupatsani usiku ndi usana kuti muzipezamo mpumulo ndi kufunafuna chisomo chake ndi kuti muzithokoza
Ndipo pa tsiku limene adzawaitana iwo nati, “Kodi ali kuti iwo amene mumaganiza kuti ndi anzanga?”

Ndipo nthawi yomweyo tidzaitana mboni kuchokera ku mtundu uliwonse ndipo tidzati, “Bweretsani umboni wanu.” Nthawi imeneyo adzadziwa kuti mwini wake choonadi ndi Mulungu ndipo zonse zimene amapeka zidzawathawira
